title: Obari
author: Obari
content: I'm seeking a $50 loan in btc and I've already discussed with @Royse777 about the terms and this is just a reference to the loan as below is my bitcoin wallet address: bc1qk4y8tmgznqg9k9t3t9rzmyqhdy522zutz3gjsu Thanks @Royse777 for giving me a listening ear.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Did you already take the loan from Royse777 and is it just a reference thread? If so, I suggest you lock this thread.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
